entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
